mapper.select: select id, username, login_time, location, ip, user_system, user_browser from tb_login_log where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_login_log(username, login_time, location, ip, user_system, user_browser) values (#{username}, #{loginTime}, #{location}, #{ip}, #{userSystem}, #{userBrowser})

insert into tb_login_log(username, login_time, location, ip, user_system, user_browser) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.loginTime}, #{entity.location}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.userSystem}, #{entity.userBrowser})

insert into tb_login_log(username, login_time, location, ip, user_system, user_browser) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.loginTime}, #{entity.location}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.userSystem}, #{entity.userBrowser})
on duplicate key update username = values(username), login_time = values(login_time), location = values(location), ip = values(ip), user_system = values(user_system), user_browser = values(user_browser)
mapper.update:
update tb_login_log
username = #{username},
login_time = #{loginTime},
location = #{location},
ip = #{ip},
user_system = #{userSystem},
user_browser = #{userBrowser},
where id = #{id}
